page.title: 05Mushroom Farming
page.content: Also in the area of Bagnall there is a Mushroom Farm.In the farm there are long sheds;here the mushrooms are grown.The mushrooms are sold to wholesalers and also to shops.The noticable change is that the farm is modernised with up to date sheds which have heating generated by Coal. The farmer who owns the farm told us that he uses specially made compost to grow the mushrooms in.He has also done other types of farming but finds this type more profitable by far. Most of the orders are done over the phone and the mushrooms are either delivered or collected by the customer. The mushrooms are grown all the year round due to the fact that they are grown in specially heated sheds.
